import React from "react" class Form extends React.Component { constructor (props) { super(props) this.state = { amount: 8, ll: true, sl: false, num: true, sym: true, pswd: "" } } render() { return (
this.setState({ amount: e.target.value })} />
this.setState({ ll: e.target.checked })} />
this.setState({ sl: e.target.checked })} />
this.setState({ num: e.target.checked })} />
this.setState({ sym: e.target.checked })} />


) } } export default Form
